news.title: Justia Lawyer Directory by the Numbers: Fourth Quarter 2022
news.description: In this first 2023 edition of Justia Lawyer Directory by the Numbers, we are taking a look back at the final quarter of 2022! Check out this post for data and trends for our lawyer directory in the months of October...

news.title: Lawyer Commercials From the Big Game
news.description: When it comes to the NFL’s biggest game of the year, the commercials are often just as much of a draw as the teams on the field. Read this article to check out some of the legal industry commercials that graced viewers’ screens this year!
